page.title: 11ANIMALS
page.content: The Somer's Arms keep a hundred{pigs, and the young bull piglets are sold for meat.In Eastnor park there are five hundred and fifty roe deer.In late August the older deer are killed to keep the herd down.The{cows}on the farms around the Eastnor area are mostly fresian_cross. The bull calves are sold for meat the heifers are mostly sold.Some of the bulls are taken to shows.The{sheep}are well bred white faced and black faced.The{lambs}are mostly sold but some are kept back for ewes or rams. Some of the farms have thirty or forty chickens some have five or six geese.They sell the eggs,they also keep some ducks which they kill and eat.
